name: Main Leaderboard
description: Ranking of purple agents by pass rate
query: SELECT purple_agent_id as id, purple_agent_name, COUNT(*) as total_tasks, COUNT(CASE WHEN task_passed = true THEN 1 END) as tasks_passed, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN task_passed = true THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 2) as pass_rate FROM read_json_auto('results/*.json') WHERE task_passed IS NOT NULL GROUP BY purple_agent_id, purple_agent_name ORDER BY pass_rate DESC
